detail_desc: Pyjama bottoms in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a gathered, elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a sturdy rib knit with a slightly deeper neckline, short raglan sleeves and a slit in one side.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trainer socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.

Fully lined, ribbed swimsuit with a fixed belt to define the waist. V-neck at the front, a deeper V-neck at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Medium coverage at the back.

Short dress in a textured-weave cotton blend with a boat neck. Double-layered top with gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Smocked section for a fitted style over the bust, waist and hips relaxing into a voluminous flounced skirt.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery appliqués and tulle at the top.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a double-layered polo neck and long sleeves.
Long T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining. The dress is made partly from recycled polyester.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

LIMITED EDITION. Blouse in airy chiffon with a frilled stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and a frilled bib front. Long sleeves with vertical frills and wide, flared cuffs with a sparkly stone button and frill trim.

Straight-cut tunic in an airy weave with a textured finish. Small stand-up collar, V-neck and ties with tassels at the neckline. Wide 3/4-length sleeves with a hem that can be folded down and a tab and button. Gently rounded hem.

Long, backless dress in softly draping jersey with a V-neck and wide ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a raw-edge hem. Lined top and short underskirt.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button,side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a chest pocket.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas with a shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with an embroidery detail on the chest and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pile lining.
Fitted V-neck top in sturdy, stretch microfibre with narrow shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Cold shoulder blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered flounce at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Two-strand metal anklet, one chain decorated with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 22-27 cm.

Fully lined bikini top to give the bust a natural shape and light support. Decorative gathers at the front, narrow, detachable ties that tie at the back of the neck, a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the sides. Metal fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton twill with a turn-down collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband for best fit over the tummy. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a unique nursing feature, V-neck and short, frilled sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in jersey made from a viscose blend with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in cotton poplin with a smocked waist and seam at the hem with a lower section in a contrasting colour.
Hair scarves in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 11x110 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in ribbed cotton jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Wide, round-necked blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery and a button placket. Long, wide, balloon sleeves with embroidery and cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal decoration and press-stud. Zip fly, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Long, padded jacket in a lustrous weave with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket, side pockets, back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in jersey. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Joggers with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a print motif on the front, pockets in the side seams,a back pocket and ribbed hems. T-shirt with a round neck and a print motif on the front.
Handmade elastic bracelets with wooden beads.
Top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front, narrow trims around the neckline and short sleeves with turn-ups.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and long sleeves with decorative stitching at the elbows. Side pockets, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in textured-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing wool, alpaca and recycled polyester. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.

Hi-top boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, fleece linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Leather sandals with narrow straps that tie around the ankles, and covered heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Waterproof, warm-lined hi-top boots in fabric with imitation leather and grosgrain details. Padded shaft with an imitation leather appliqué, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in patterned chiffon with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side, and straight, wide legs with a high slit at the front. Partly lined.

Pyjamas in soft velour. Top with an embroidered motif on the front, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), long sleeves and ribbing at neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
A-line dress with double-layered flutter sleeves and shimmering buttons at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather sandals with decorative studs, adjustable straps at the top with concealed elastication and metal buckles, and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Long V-neck tunic in a soft viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and at the sides, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
